31f9ab15-34ed-45e9-8b5b-b769da0aa1a3.title: Guard Captain
31f9ab15-34ed-45e9-8b5b-b769da0aa1a3.text: I don' need a hand drinkin me beer, go 'way!

18fe348c-e99a-4030-b264-450627230554.title: Guard Captain
18fe348c-e99a-4030-b264-450627230554.text: Talk to tha' hand coz thish face ain't lishtnin'!

e3a1fae4-308e-441c-be5a-ee73dbaf5b67.title: Note
e3a1fae4-308e-441c-be5a-ee73dbaf5b67.text: Add stuff about using other ales on the captain

e9841a56-b3aa-4537-b0d0-3da4c3007e47.title: Guard Captain
e9841a56-b3aa-4537-b0d0-3da4c3007e47.text:
Yeeeuuuch! I hatesh that shtuff, jusht bring ush a beer!
Mmmmm beer!

faef5c7b-8c1e-414d-9cee-5f4c3faae766.text:
Perhaps you should be carrying the hand that Bert gave you as
evidence of the crime.

ec4a639a-f7bc-4936-b1cc-214b8deb6358.title: <player>
ec4a639a-f7bc-4936-b1cc-214b8deb6358.text: Sir? I have some more beer for you...

8a0839d9-70d5-409a-8ded-ebfd6cbada98.text:
You give the beer to the Guard Captain who takes a
large gulp.

a99f505a-1df7-46bb-8df1-a2fbed2080ce.title: Guard Captain
a99f505a-1df7-46bb-8df1-a2fbed2080ce.text: Ahh... jus' wha' I need, now, wha' did you wanna know?

7c788fc5-da12-4eea-b89c-adfa7d3f60ff.title: <player>
7c788fc5-da12-4eea-b89c-adfa7d3f60ff.text:
I've come to report that Bert, the sandman, found a
hand in the sand pit.

d449f838-07e1-42e3-9980-6e7f5c2a34a2.title: Guard Captain
d449f838-07e1-42e3-9980-6e7f5c2a34a2.text:
Lucky for him, means he can get even more work
done.

1a159a39-429b-4519-a001-4f75f07fcd0b.title: <player>
1a159a39-429b-4519-a001-4f75f07fcd0b.text: But aren't you going to find out who it ... belonged to?

ddcdbbc7-7d22-4179-8c68-4a569523f673.text:
You hand the... hand... to the Guard Captain, he
fumbles with it, drops it in his beer, fishes it out and
hands it back.

412cc578-ca71-4157-a97b-17ff4ac9288b.title: Guard Captain
412cc578-ca71-4157-a97b-17ff4ac9288b.text:
Oops, No 'arm done. S'prob'ly a wizard, i's always the
wizards fault, go ask them, jus' ring the bell outshide the
guild and talk to the first pointy hatted ninny you shee!

0b0f465d-a0c0-4070-b9ab-49aed97cae5c.title: <player>
0b0f465d-a0c0-4070-b9ab-49aed97cae5c.text: Err... ok, I'll go ring the bell and talk to a wizard then.

2118f8f1-d960-4160-9a13-73739ad97719.title: Guard Captain
2118f8f1-d960-4160-9a13-73739ad97719.text:
Go 'way! This pint'sh nearly finished! Unlessh you got
more that ish....? Wizards, s'all the wizard's fault...prob'ly
that Zavistic one, he'sh the worsht!

d2857309-44a8-4b4a-847a-f9cab7e44829.title: <player>
d2857309-44a8-4b4a-847a-f9cab7e44829.text:
I think I should go talk to the wizards in the guild
before he makes me buy him more beer!

9b9a28c6-8f00-480f-aff6-fb595ad31a8e.title: Guard Captain
9b9a28c6-8f00-480f-aff6-fb595ad31a8e.text: E're, you left this 'and in me beer!

933b8e42-c534-4282-b323-e59662ac16ba.text:
The Guard Captain fishes the hand out of his beer and hands it to
you.
